_sText:
Town Haste - Hostage Rescue

Counter-Terrorists: Terrorists, after two successfull series of bombings in the central town, as they fled, ended up in the suburbs. This is the last point where you must stop them before they escape out of reach. Without Hostages they are doomed, so try to evacuate them all.

Terrorists: Prevent the Counter-Terrorists from rescuing the Hostages, eliminate the Counter-Terrorists and escape from the town.

Original layout and sound
by B@tman (ILLA)

Conversion to CS:S
by -=CrisisLab=- Martin Frobisher (Kevin Hilton)

Original Textures
by -=CrisisLab=- Enyd (Michelle S)

-=CrisisLab=- Hemophilia (Kevin Good)

Models converted from America's Army
by illkid
